info.title: PortalApi v6
info.description: This is a JWT authentication/authorization portal api for GosuGamers's frontend

parameters.name: RoleType
parameters.description:
Role type
null: All
1: Host
2: Commentator
3: Analyst
4: Observer
5: Interviewer
99: Other

Opponent placement
1: Team 1 or Player 1
2: Team 2 or Player 2

ranking.description:
Ranking
If null: not show ranking

openType.description: 1 : "Open in new tab" 2: "Open in existing page"

logLevel.description: Trace=0, Debug=1, Information=2, Warning=3, Error=4, Critical=5, None=6

time.description: Game time when the event happens Unit: second

hasFollowed.description:
Has followed
null: not login
true: login and followed
false: login and not follow

streak.description:
Steak
Greater than 0: loss streak
Less than 0: win streak
